segments.text: Kate , what do you like to do tonight ? Do you often go to the movies ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course . I often go to the movies .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There ’ s a good movie called Summer in Beijing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I heard it ’ s a very good movie .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let ’ s find out what time it starts .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let ’ s look at the newspaper .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here it is . It starts at 8 o'clock .
segments.speaker: S1
